page.title: 10TREDINGTON SCHOOL CONTINUED
page.content: {Philip Tapper}is also a pupil at the School. He is nine years old. Philip lives two miles away from the school at a place called Fiddington. He gets to school by car. It takes him about five minutes to get to school. At playtime he plays British Bulldogs and Ten Scoops. His{hobbies}are Lego, Star Wars and swimming. He likes to play Connect 4 and Guess. His favourite meal is chips, sausage and beans. He hates tomatoes. He attends an atheletics club after school. He has two cats Snoopy and Lucky. He goes swimming with the school at Tewkesbury. There are 8 girls and 16 boys in{his class.}He starts school at 8.45 and finishes at 3.00. He was four when he started school. He remembers playing a game when he started school. He will be ten when he leaves Treddington School.
